page.title: 07FARMING
page.content: {White House Farm,Guarlford,Malvern. Farmer : Mr.G.L.Bott Farmhouse : 300 years old. 125 acres. 10 barns and livestock housing. Mixed farming _ cereal crops, soft fruits,cattle, sheep, hens. Mechanised farming. 3 workers. {Little Clevelode Farm, Malvern. Farmer : Mrs.J.R.Clarke. Farm :approx.200 years old. 15 acres. Farm not main source of income_ hobby. Stables, and half timbered barn with grade 3 preservation order. Beef cattle _ silage and hay for fodder and bedding. Mechanised farming. 1 worker.Until 1970, used to be dairy farm of 100 acres.
